meanings: (정보나 지식을 갖추다) know, learn, have (good) knowledge (of), be familiar (with)
(이해하다) understand, know, see, follow, appreciate, (informal) get, make out
(깨닫다, 인지하다) realize, recognize, find, notice, sense, (formal) perceive, be aware (of), be conscious (of)
in the manner of one being unaware of something, unwittingly
get the inside story of the incident
get a glimpse of his character

vlive.english: Great! I got to learn STAY's tastes.

vlive.korean: 어떻게 하다가 알게 된 사이예요? - 희준이? How did you get to know each other? - Heejun? 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 남사친이 남친 되면 A+ 받는다는 수업 [썸타는 일주일] - EP.00

vlive.korean: 나왔는데 이제 민호가 최근에 알게 된 그런... - 그런 거야? MINO came to know it recently. - Oh, really? 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
vlive.english: MINO came to know it recently. - Oh, really?

vlive.korean: 그래서 알게 된 이후부터는 거의 2일 1배달? After we knew that, we have it delivered like once in two days? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 최범규의 별밤✨
vlive.english: After we knew that, we have it delivered like once in two days?
